bill_title: to establish certain requirements powers related to county zoning districts.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to establish certain requirements powers related to county zoning districts. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 11-2 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: If the voters within a county establish a zoning district pursuant to § § 11-2-37, the board of county commissioners shall within thirty days appoint a zoning district planning commission of three or more members living within the zoning district. The total membership of the zoning district planning commission shall always be an odd number, and at least one member of the zoning district planning commission shall be a member of the board. Section 2. That chapter 11-2 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Once the zoning district planning commission is established pursuant to section 1 of this Act, it shall prepare a comprehensive plan for the zoning district. The zoning district planning commission shall approve the comprehensive plan by a majority vote and after a public hearing. The approved comprehensive plan shall then be submitted to the county commission for approval. The county commission shall act on the submitted zoning district comprehensive plan within thirty days after receiving it from the zoning district planning commission. Section 3. That chapter 11-2 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: A zoning district planning commission shall abide by the same requirements and has the same powers within the zoning district as provided for a county zoning commission pursuant to § § 11-2-3 to 11-2-36, inclusive.
